item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Summary Experienced seismologist in multiple fields, including waveform and data analysis, body- and surface-wave tomography, statistical seismology, and earthquake cycle modeling.

item.title: Failure Resume
item.description: Since I am not the [[notes/My Hero Academics|hero type]], might as well be my own anti-heroü§° 2022 Rejected by LLNL without a second round for a postdoc position Paper on seismicity modeling got rejected by GRL Failed the interview of a postdoc position in Uni Plymouth 2021 Didn’t go to any conference 2020 Attend the text-based EGU to present the NZ seismicity project and got next-to-zero response.
